title: How does noise from concept 2 model D rowing machine compare with an elliptical training machine? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have a Concept II at home. It is noisy, especially if you are able to row over 800 Cal/hour. I have it downstairs and just crank up the stereo to drown out the noise. My wife complains. It is not easy to row with an iPhone or iPod, but it can be done.

Noise is much louder on the Concept 2, but if your technique is good, the exercise benefits are far greater on the rowing machine as it builds legs & upper body. It’s a trade-off, depending on what is most important to you.
